frames.caption: A vast, cracked desert landscape stretches towards a massive fire on the horizon. Intense flames and thick black smoke rise into the sky, creating a dramatic and apocalyptic scene.
frames.description: The scene depicts an arid desert with a cracked earth foreground, leading to a large fire in the distance. The fire is consuming the horizon, with flames and smoke dominating the sky, suggesting a catastrophic event.

frames.caption: A vast, cracked desert landscape stretches towards a massive, intense fire in the distance. Thick, dark smoke billows into the sky, creating a dramatic contrast against the bright flames.
frames.description: The scene depicts a desolate, arid environment with a large fire burning in the background. The cracked earth suggests a dry, barren setting, while the towering flames and smoke indicate a significant fire event.

summary: Nature: desert, cracked earth. Objects: fire, smoke. Actions: burning. Emotions: intensity, desolation. Scenes: disaster, apocalyptic, wilderness. Concepts: climate change, environmental catastrophe, environmental impact
